profile.keyDisclaimer: ꯄ꯭ꯔꯥꯏꯚꯦꯠ ꯀꯤ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯗꯥꯏꯒꯤ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯃꯥꯡ ꯂꯦꯚꯔꯦ. ꯑꯦꯁꯞꯣꯔꯠ ꯄꯥꯁ꯭ꯋꯥꯗ ꯃꯤꯡꯇꯥ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯕꯦꯛꯀꯨꯞ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯑꯃꯁꯤ ꯑꯃꯅꯤ ꯇꯥꯡ ꯗꯣꯗꯤ ꯏꯅ ꯃꯇꯝ.

profile.callTextForwardingDescription: ꯑꯏꯟꯀꯣꯅꯤꯡ ꯀꯣꯂ ꯅꯍꯥ ꯇꯦꯛꯁ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯕꯥ ꯃꯐꯝ ꯄꯥꯏꯟ/ꯏꯃꯦꯜ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯐꯣꯔꯋꯣꯔꯗ ꯇꯧꯔꯤ. ꯑꯣꯇꯒꯤꯡ ꯀꯣꯂ/ꯇꯦꯛꯁ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯆꯥꯠꯐꯣꯔꯤꯌꯥ ꯅꯔ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯕꯥ ꯇꯧꯔꯤ.

press.title: Press
press.contact: For media inquiries, reach us at press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: For media inquiries, reach us at press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia is a secure messenger with instant translation and E2E encryption, designed to make global conversations private and effortless.
press.assetsText: Logos, screenshots, and product imagery (coming soon).

careers.title: Careers
careers.intro: We’re a small team building a private, global messenger. If you care about encryption, accessibility, and delightful UX, we’d love to hear from you.
careers.openRoles: Open roles: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: How to apply: Email your resume/links to jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: About Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia is a secure, multilingual messenger with end-to-end encryption, instant translation, and voice/video calling. Our mission is simple: help people connect—safely, privately, and across languages.

values.control: Control: Disappearing messages & read receipts are optional.

about.howDescription: Messages are encrypted on your device before they leave it. Translation, backups, and device sync are designed to minimize what our servers can see.

advertise.title: Advertise with Chatforia
advertise.description: Reach engaged messaging users with tasteful, brand-safe placements. We offer banner inventory in high-visibility spots, sponsorships, and house promos. Premium subscribers do not see ads.

adsense.withPubId: We currently serve ads via Google AdSense. If you’d like to target us through Google Ads, use publisher ID {{pubId}} and ask for managed placement on our units below. Direct sponsorships are available—use the form.
adsense.noPubId: We currently serve ads via Google AdSense. Direct sponsorships are also available—use the form below.

advertise.noPlacements: No placements configured yet. Add them in ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: High session frequency and dwell time in chat UI
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments (e.g., “Start a Chat” modal) available
why.deals: Direct deals or programmatic via AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Thanks! Your inquiry is on its way. We’ll follow up shortly.
form.missingRequired: Please fill in name, email, and message.
form.successToast: Thanks! We’ll be in touch soon.
form.mailtoInfo: Opening your email client to send the inquiry…

legal.disclaimerStart: By submitting, you agree to our

account.q: ꯀꯔꯤꯗ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯕ ꯅꯍꯥ ꯑꯦꯝ ꯇꯧꯕꯥ ꯅꯨꯡ?
account.a: ꯑꯦꯞ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯕꯥ ꯅꯍꯥ ꯇꯣꯟ ꯇꯧ, “ꯀꯔꯤꯗ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯕꯥ” ꯑꯗꯣ ꯇꯧ, ꯏꯃꯦꯜ/ꯄꯥꯏꯟ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯗꯦꯚꯤꯔꯦ. ꯑꯦꯝ ꯇꯧꯕꯥ, “ꯄꯥꯁ꯭ꯋꯥꯗ ꯊꯧꯕꯥ” ꯑꯗꯣ ꯇꯧ.

privacy.a: ꯍꯧꯕꯥ. ꯃꯦꯁꯤꯡ ꯅꯍꯥ ꯀꯣꯂ ꯑꯦꯂ꯭ꯗ-ꯑꯦꯟꯗ ꯑꯦꯁꯞꯣꯔꯠ ꯑꯗꯣꯟ ꯇꯧꯔꯤ.

contact.title: ꯀꯣꯟꯇꯦꯛ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯕꯥ
contact.successMsg: ꯑꯦꯁꯤꯟ — ꯑꯗꯣꯞ ꯇꯦꯃ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯏꯅꯔꯦꯁ ꯇꯧꯔꯤ.
contact.errorSend: ꯇꯦꯇꯦ ꯇꯧꯕꯥ ꯇꯧꯔꯕꯥ. support@chatforia.com ꯑꯗꯣ ꯏꯃꯦꯜ ꯇꯧꯕꯥ.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how Chatforia (“we”, “us”) collects, uses, and shares information when you use our apps and services. We design Chatforia to minimize the data we can access.

infoWeCollect.title: Information we collect
infoWeCollect.account: Account info (e.g., email/phone) to create and secure your account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (messages/calls) is end-to-end encrypted; we can’t read it.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage like crash logs, device type, or coarse analytics to improve performance.

howWeUse.title: How we use information
howWeUse.provide: Provide and secure the service (auth, spam/abuse detection).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We don’t sell personal data. We may share limited data with processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) under strict contracts.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your region (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), you may request access, correction, deletion, or opt-out of certain processing. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & security
retention.body: We retain only what’s needed to operate the service and apply industry-standard security. E2E content can’t be decrypted by us.

children.title: Children
children.body: Chatforia isn’t directed to children under 13 (or as required by your local law).

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We’ll post updates here and revise the “Last updated” date.

intro.body: By using Chatforia you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, don’t use the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Provide accurate info and keep credentials secure.
accounts.itemResponsibility: You’re responsible for activity on your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No illegal, abusive, or infringing content; no spam or automated abuse.

yourContent.title: Your content
yourContent.body: You retain rights to your content. You grant us necessary rights to operate the service (e.g., routing, storage, translation).

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers & liability
disclaimer.body: Service is provided “as is” without warranties. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Chatforia isn’t liable for indirect or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms; continued use after changes means acceptance.

doNotSell.title: Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information
doNotSell.body: Chatforia does not sell personal information. California residents can still submit requests under CPRA using the button below.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.body: Chatforia uses minimal cookies (e.g., session, security). We don’t use third-party ads cookies. Manage cookies via your browser’s settings.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Unable to load phone number status.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: No number assigned. Pick one by area code to start texting.

startChatModal.searchPrompt: ꯌꯨꯔꯁꯦꯟꯃ/ꯄꯥꯏꯟ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯇꯥꯏ ꯇꯧ ꯁꯥꯔꯁ ꯇꯧ.

accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: ꯅꯣꯃꯥꯔ ꯁꯥꯏꯖ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯍꯧ. ꯑꯦꯛꯁꯦꯁꯤꯜꯤꯕꯤꯇꯤ ꯁꯦꯇꯤꯡꯁ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯄꯨꯝꯅꯥ ꯄꯥꯎꯒꯤ.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
ꯃꯦꯁꯤꯡ & ꯀꯣꯂ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯚꯤꯖ꯭ꯔ ꯑꯦꯜꯔꯁ
ꯑꯦꯜꯔ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯁꯦꯟ ꯅꯍꯥ ꯇꯥꯏꯂ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯕ꯭ꯂꯤꯟꯛ ꯇꯧ.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
ꯅꯍꯥꯔꯣꯛ ꯃꯦꯁꯤꯡ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯚꯥꯏꯕ꯭ꯔꯦꯠ (ꯍꯟꯅꯥ ꯇꯧꯕ ꯃꯇꯝ)
ꯑꯦꯜꯔꯁ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯚꯥꯏꯕ꯭ꯔꯦꯠ ꯇꯧ.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
ꯀꯣꯂ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯐ꯭ꯂꯥꯁ ꯇꯧ
ꯀꯣꯂ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯔꯤꯡ ꯇꯧꯕ ꯃꯇꯝ ꯃꯣꯡ ꯐ꯭ꯂꯥꯁ ꯇꯧ.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
ꯚꯣꯏꯁ ꯅꯣꯠ ꯑꯣꯇꯣ-ꯇ꯭ꯔꯦꯟꯁ꯭ꯔꯤꯕ
ꯑꯗꯣ ꯑꯥꯗꯤꯑꯣ ꯃꯦꯁꯤꯡ ꯑꯗꯣ ꯇ꯭ꯔꯦꯟꯁ꯭ꯔꯤꯕ ꯇꯥꯔꯁ꯭ꯀ꯭ꯔꯦꯁ ꯑꯣꯏꯅꯕꯥ.
